Sentencas: The residual strains in the composites of nickel oxide (NiO) and yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) and in the cermets of reduced nickel (Ni) and YSZ, which were used as anodes for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), were measured using X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Influence of NiO Reduction on Residual Strain in NiO/Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: The influence of Ni reduction on the residual strain was evaluated.
Titulo: Influence of NiO Reduction on Residual Strain in NiO/Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: Tensile and compressive residual strains caused by thermal strain were observed in NiO and YSZ phases, respectively.
Titulo: Influence of NiO Reduction on Residual Strain in NiO/Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: They clearly depended on the volume fraction of NiO and YSZ, and changed proportionally.
Titulo: Influence of NiO Reduction on Residual Strain in NiO/Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: The YSZ phase in the Ni-YSZ cermets also showed a similar dependence on the volume fraction of NiO.
Titulo: Influence of NiO Reduction on Residual Strain in NiO/Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: The compressive strain increased as the NiO increased; however, a local maximum was observed for NiO 50 vol%, beyond which it decreased with increasing amount of NiO. Compressive strain in the YSZ phase in the Ni-YSZ with NiO of 60 vol%, which is a common volume fraction of SOFC anodes, was only 30% of that in the NiO-YSZ.
Titulo: Influence of NiO Reduction on Residual Strain in NiO/Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: Plastic deformation of the Ni phase near the interfaces, and relaxation of the compressive strain in the YSZ phase were responsible for this phenomenon.
Titulo: Influence of NiO Reduction on Residual Strain in NiO/Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: This revealed the difference in the residual strain in the YSZ phase after reduction.
Titulo: Influence of NiO Reduction on Residual Strain in NiO/Ni-YSZ
